title: Patriots release Stephon Gilmore, Browns-Chargers important matchup, Super Bowl Champion Cliff Avril on Rams-Seahawks TNF
itunes:title: Patriots release Stephon Gilmore, Browns-Chargers important matchup, Super Bowl Champion Cliff Avril on Rams-Seahawks TNF
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Michael Robinson discuss the importance of Browns-Chargers this week. Fantasy Football questions answered along with which team has the most exciting offense in the NFL. Breaking news with Stephon Gilmore being released by the Patriots. Plus, Super Bowl Champion Cliff Avril talks Russell Wilson and prepares us for Rams-Seahawks on TNF.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
